name: Xdemineur
description: Xdemineur is a minesweeper game. Players need to find out all non-mine grids without stepping on mines according to figures appeared after clicked on grids in the shortest time. It tests the IQ of players with simple rules and is very suitable for you to relax in the spare time.

en_US.description: Xdemineur is a minesweeper game. Players need to find out all non-mine grids without stepping on mines according to figures appeared after clicked on grids in the shortest time. It tests the IQ of players with simple rules and is very suitable for you to relax in the spare time.
en_US.name: Xdemineur

zh_CN.description: Xdemineur是一款扫雷游戏，玩家需要在最短的时间内根据点击格子出现的数字找出所有非雷格子，同时避免踩雷。Xdemineur考验的是玩家的智商，规则简单明了，非常适合在您休息之余、无聊之时轻松一下。
zh_CN.name: Xdemineur
